  "startUrls": [
    { "url": "{{13.norm_url}}" }
  ],

  "linkSelector": "a[href]",

  "includeUrlGlobs": [
    "*/uber-uns*",
    "*/ueber-uns*",
    "*/about*",
    "*/unternehmen*",
    "*/karriere*",
    "*/jobs*",
    "*/benefits*"
  ],

  "maxCrawlPages": 10,
  "maxCrawlDepth": 3,

  "proxyConfiguration": { "useApifyProxy": true },

  "pageFunction": "async function pageFunction(context) {\n  const { request, page, log } = context;\n  // Störelemente entfernen\n  const toRemove = ['nav','footer','script','style','noscript','svg','img[src^=\"data:\"]'];\n  try {\n    await page.evaluate((sel) => {\n      sel.forEach(s => { document.querySelectorAll(s).forEach(el => el.remove()); });\n    }, toRemove);\n  } catch (e) {\n    log.debug('Cleanup skipped: ' + e.message);\n  }\n\n  // Lesbaren Text holen\n  const text = await page.evaluate(() => (document.body.innerText || '')\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, ' ')  // Whitespace glätten\n    .trim());\n\n  // Alle Links auslesen\n  const allLinks = await page.$$eval('a[href]', as => as.map(a => a.href).filter(Boolean));\n\n  // Social Links filtern\n  const socialRe = /(linkedin\\.com\\/company|facebook\\.com|instagram\\.com|twitter\\.com|x\\.com|youtube\\.com|kununu\\.com|xing\\.com|tiktok\\.com)/i;\n  const socialLinks = Array.from(new Set(allLinks.filter(h => socialRe.test(h))));\n\n  return {\n    url: request.url,\n    text,\n    socialLinks\n  };\n}",

  "removeElementsCssSelector": "nav, footer, script, style, noscript, svg, img[src^='data:']"
}
